name: codegen
description: A macro tool to generate haxe and none-haxe codes from existing haxe source codes.
releasenote: Typescript constructor return value fix. Haxe extern: remove @:build meta. Added "applyNatives" switch. Skip all types on empty filter bugfix. @noapi => @:noapi (to skip generate this meta for runtime). Saving docs (/** ... */).
